DOC.criteria: Definitive diagnosis multiple sclerosis Kurtzke Expanded Disability Status 3.0 6.5 Able walk treadmill minimum 0.5 mile per hour hold onto handrail Cognitively emotionally competent A MiniMental State Examination score > 21 Composite score computerize Sensory Organization Test < 70 Documented MSrelated relapse previous 6 month Major MSspecific medication change within previous 3 month Presence another major comorbidity neurological disorder , uncontrolled pain , hypertension , diabetes
